document_data.title: Castle Maerimydra
document_data.name: Castle Maerimydra
document_data.mainbody: '''Castle Maerimydra''' was a fortification at the heart of [[Maerimydra]] and the seat of the ruling house.
document_data.Physical Description:
Standing atop a 100-ft-high (30 m) plateau, the elegant curves and fluted battlements of this castle represented the epitome of [[drow]] aesthetics. At 250-ft (76 m) tall and comprising seven floors, Castle Maerimydra was by far the largest noble house in Maerimydra.

It comprised three basic structures: the Great Tower, the Lesser Tower and the South Column.
document_data.Defenses: The castle was warded by a powerful ''[[forbiddance]]'' spell that prevented most creatures from entering without the proper password. The walls of the castle itself were magically strengthened to make them even harder to breach.
